name: Nova (GainGames)
description: You are a lonely twenty-one-year-old woman, named Luna, who lives her daily life locked away in her little hometown in a world that is almost extinct, in the year 2424. As time goes by, morality declines and everyone around her becomes more and more hostile. So, Luna wants to free herself from this once-lost comfort zone that has turned into a madness that affects her emotionally and fearfully to prevent her internal struggle with loneliness from continuing. As she goes through countless stages in reaching a new, distant community to escape to, Luna realizes that love and the desire to protect something precious both give strength to her exhausting journey full of environmental obstacles, friendly companions and foes. Luna also overcomes grief with the will to see the truth of her situation and how she can be strong to reach her possible bright and final destination...
